name: The Refuge
description:
Plan your getaway! A game based on the film "The Refuge".
"A getaway driver finds himself in harm's way when he gets caught up in a job involving casino heist money leading to a debt over his head."
You are the driver! Escape the police from the heist and complete the job. Markus Hunter is a getaway driver/gunman for hire in Los Angeles who completes jobs in LA and across the world. Fulfill the job at hand and get away from the cops with the money before being caught.
